Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Boston in 1979...
Injured on 6/22/1982 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/10/1983, off Tom Filer (CHW)...
Released by Boston on 4/1/1985...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 5/5/1985 to a minor league deal...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/11/1986 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
